mapper.select:
SELECT count(sn.mm_paihang_id) from mm_paihang sn LEFT JOIN cloud_caoping lg ON sn.cloud_caoping_id=lg.cloud_caoping_id
LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON le.emp_id = lg.emp_id LEFT JOIN cloud_caoping_guige lggcp ON lggcp.cloud_caoping_guige_id = lg.cloud_caoping_guige_id LEFT JOIN cloud_caoping_use lusecp ON lusecp.cloud_caoping_use_id = lg.cloud_caoping_use_id LEFT JOIN cloud_caoping_type ltypecp ON ltypecp.cloud_caoping_type_id = lg.cloud_caoping_type_id
LEFT JOIN cloud_jixie_guige lggjx ON lggjx.cloud_jixie_guige_id = lg.cloud_jixie_guige_id LEFT JOIN cloud_jixie_use lusejx ON lusejx.cloud_jixie_use_id = lg.cloud_jixie_use_id
LEFT JOIN cloud_caozhong_guige lggcz ON lggcz.cloud_caozhong_guige_id = lg.cloud_caozhong_guige_id LEFT JOIN cloud_caozhong_type ltypecz ON ltypecz.cloud_caozhong_type_id = lg.cloud_caozhong_type_id
WHERE 1=1
AND sn.is_del = #{is_del}
AND sn.cloud_caoping_id = #{cloud_caoping_id}
AND (lg.cloud_caoping_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR lg.cloud_caoping_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR le.emp_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR lggcp.cloud_caoping_guige_cont like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR lusecp.cloud_caoping_use_cont like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR ltypecp.cloud_caoping_type_cont like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR lggjx.cloud_jixie_guige_cont like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR lusejx.cloud_jixie_use_cont like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR lggcz.cloud_caozhong_guige_cont like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR ltypecz.cloud_caozhong_type_cont like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mm_paihang( mm_paihang_id, cloud_caoping_id, top_num, is_del, end_time) VALUES ( #{mm_paihang_id},#{cloud_caoping_id}, #{top_num}, #{is_del}, #{end_time})
mapper.update: UPDATE mm_paihang SET is_del=1 WHERE mm_paihang_id=#{mm_paihang_id}
UPDATE mm_paihang SET top_num = #{top_num}, is_del = #{is_del}, end_time = #{end_time} WHERE mm_paihang_id=#{mm_paihang_id}
UPDATE mm_paihang SET is_del='1' WHERE end_time < #{nowTime}
